text: Wibuke igihe Allah azavuga ati “Yewe Issa (Yesu) mwene Mariyamu (Mariya)! Ibuka ingabire zanjye naguhundagajeho n’izo nahundagaje ku mubyeyi wawe; ubwo nagushyigikizaga Roho Ntagatifu [Malayika Jibril (Gaburiheli)], ukavugisha abantu ukivuka no mu gihe wari umaze kuba mukuru. (Unibuke) igihe nakwigishaga kwandika, ubuhanga, Tawurati n’Ivanjili ndetse n’igihe wabumbaga ibumba ukarikoramo igisa nk’inyoni ku burenganzira bwanjye, nuko ugahuhamo maze kikaba inyoni ku bushobozi bwanjye, ugakiza impumyi n’ababembe ku bushobozi bwanjye. (Unibuke) ubwo wazuraga abapfuye ku bushobozi bwanjye n’igihe nagukizaga bene Isiraheli (ubwo bashakaga kukwica), ndetse n’igihe wabazaniraga ibitangaza bigaragara nuko abahakanye muri bo bakavuga bati “Ibi nta kindi biri cyo uretse ko ari uburozi bugaragara.”
